name: Sweet Rainbow Candy Cooking & Chocolate Candy Bars
description: Sweet Rainbow Candy Cooking & Chocolate Bars Cooking Games is a fun game for Kids & Families who love cooking up Rainbow Candy & Chocolate Bars!  Choose from Cooking Rainbow Sugar Gummy Candy or Delicious Chocolate Candy Bars filled with an assortment of Candy & Toppings!  Select Rainbow Sugar Candy and scoop a wide variety of Gummy Candy, Sugar Gummy Bears, and more!  Gummy Candies include the following gummy candy: Rainbow Burgers, Sugar Rings, Gummy Cherries, Sugar Drops & Rainbow gummy Bears!  Kids can also select Gummy Lips, Candy Corn, Jelly Beans, Hearts, Candy Bricks, Gummy Worms and More! Fill your Bag up with all your favorite gummy treats, select a colorful bag, decorate with stickers, then open up the bag and enjoy a feast of candy!  Chocolate Bars include a variety of flavors such as milk and dark chocolate, as well as mint chocolate and other fun varieties!  Cook your favorite Chocolate Bar filling & Fill the Chocolate bars with more candy, and top it off with your favorite chocolate, chill and serve! Wrap them in fun Candy Wrappers, then unwrap your homemade chocolate bar, and decorate with your favorite candy!  Sweet Rainbow Candy Maker & Chocolate Candy Bars is fun for all ages! Kids and Families will adore this game!
